name: The Grass is Always Greener on the other Side
name_original: The Grass is Always Greener on the other Side
description:
A top-down vandalizing simulator in which you must attack your neighbours to demonstrate that the grass is not always greener on the other side.
Made for Game Off 2022.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to use items and interact with menus
  • Escape to exit menus
  • Q and E to change inventory

Made by:

  • Ukarus
  • David094
  • GrafEisen

Assets by:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/garden-gnome-potted-plants
  • https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-flower-recolor
  • https://emily2.itch.io/modern-city
  • https://lpc.opengameart.org/static/LPC-Style-Guide/build/assets.htm
  • https://opengameart.org/content/breaking-bottle
  • https://www.soundjay.com/aerosol-can-sounds-1.html
  • Graden music and ending by Kevin
  • Neighbour music by Aiva
